analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CompliantCrowdsale.approveMint (/unique_chucks/9/0x095c3f181cde64ff0d96ec14fba29210f2851fe2.sol#906-932):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(pendingMints[nonce].to,pendingMints[nonce].tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x095c3f181cde64ff0d96ec14fba29210f2851fe2.sol#918-922)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds(pendingMints[nonce].weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/9/0x095c3f181cde64ff0d96ec14fba29210f2851fe2.sol#928-931)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pendingMints (/unique_chucks/9/0x095c3f181cde64ff0d96ec14fba29210f2851fe2.sol#931-932)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0x095c3f181cde64ff0d96ec14fba29210f2851fe2.sol#63-81) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x095c3f181cde64ff0d96ec14fba29210f2851fe2.sol#75)

CompliantCrowdsale.approveMint (/unique_chucks/9/0x095c3f181cde64ff0d96ec14fba29210f2851fe2.sol#906-932) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(pendingMints[nonce].to,pendingMints[nonce].tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0x095c3f181cde64ff0d96ec14fba29210f2851fe2.sol#918-922)
